# Test code syntax highlighting

# Start server
exec md2html -input code.md -http :8097 &
sleep 1s

# Test that Chroma CSS is included
exec curl -s http://localhost:8097/
stdout 'chroma'

# Test that code blocks are rendered
exec curl -s http://localhost:8097/
stdout 'Hello, World!'

# Cleanup
exec pkill -f 'md2html.*8097'

-- code.md --
